about.name: Ankit Mawle
about.title: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Innovator
about.description: Crafting cutting-edge solutions in VLSI, AI/ML, Web3, and Cloud Technologies. Transforming ideas into reality with code that matters.
bio: I'm a versatile full-stack developer with a passion for cutting-edge technologies. My expertise spans from VLSI system design to modern web technologies, AI/ML, and blockchain development.
I've developed the VSDIAT LMS for VLSI System Design and worked on various projects involving CAD/CAM software, cloud technologies, and innovative web applications.

projects.title: VSDSquadron Pro Edge AI
projects.description: RISC-V-based AI platform with embedded AI applications on Sifive-Hifive boards, featuring firmware optimization and hardware-software co-design.

projects.title: IoT-Powered Energy Monitoring System
projects.description: ESP32-based logger for high-voltage systems with machine learning-based load forecasting and local cloud infrastructure for data access.

projects.title: Tokeniz – Web3 Gifting Platform
projects.description: NFT gifting platform allowing cryptocurrency locking with scheduled delivery and real-time updates. Winner at Tron Grand Hackathon.

projects.title: Cepton Lidar Testing System
projects.description: Standardized Lidar hardware testing workflow with Python-based automation and data visualization tools for Cepton India.

projects.title: AgriTech Precision Farming Platform
projects.description: IoT-powered precision agriculture system with pH sensing, nutrient detection, and automatic fertilization, enhanced by ML-based analysis.

projects.title: Automated Pharmaceutical Shop
projects.description: Smart dispensing system for pharmacies with IoT integration, sensor-based stock control, and mobile app interface.

projects.title: SmartPay – Web3 Microtransaction Platform
projects.description: EVM-based crypto microtransaction solution with features similar to UPI, allowing secure, real-time payments.

experience.title: Software Architect
experience.description: Led development of IoT, AI, and embedded systems; managed client relations and system architecture for industry-specific solutions.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer & Head of IoT
experience.description: Directed IoT solution development across verticals, deployed infrastructure for agriculture and energy monitoring systems.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer (Consultant)
experience.description: Designed and implemented Lidar hardware testing framework and standard operating procedures for automation.

experience.title: Embedded Development Engineer
experience.description: Developed STM32-based embedded systems for industrial automation and custom hardware interfaces.
